alert.note: Alert for Escambia Coastal; Escambia Inland; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Baldwin, west central Okaloosa, Santa Rosa and central Escambia Counties through 100 AM CDT... At 1200 AM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Jay to 3 miles northeast of Molino to 14 miles northeast of Loxley to 4 miles northeast of Stapleton. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pensacola, Ferry Pass, Brent, West Pensacola, Ensley, Gonzalez, Pace, Milton, Goulding, Bagdad, Lillian, Myrtle Grove, Molino, Jay, Point Baker, Pea Ridge, Roeville and Floridatown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for south central and southwestern Alabama...and northwestern Florida.

area.areaDesc: Escambia Coastal; Escambia Inland; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland
